definition: Ci county in Handan 邯鄲|邯郸[Han2 dan1], Hebei

sentences.english: The impending middle-line works of the South-to-North Water Diversion Project will have two diversion intakes in Cixian County.
sentences.chinese: 即将动工的南水北调中线工程在磁县有分水口两处。

sentences.english: The freshest surface fracture zone which has been discovered recently in the west mountain of Cixian County is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了磁县西部山区新近发现的最新地表破裂带。

sentences.english: The Northern Dynasties tomb with murals at Wanzhang in Cixian county, Hebei province, contains the burial of a prominent personage.
sentences.chinese: 河北磁县湾漳北朝壁画墓是一座规格很高的墓葬。
